document.full_text: south korea's ruling party will block further tax cuts for companies and individuals and instead boost financial support for the poor, a newly appointed party leader said monday, as the crisis-hit government strives to boost its popularity.
document.title: south korea ruling party mulls policy shift amid crisis
lines_and_colors: south korea's ruling party will block further tax cuts for companies and individuals and instead boost financial support for the poor, a newly appointed party leader said monday, as the crisis-hit government strives to boost its popularity.
